posts.post_content:
A long shot I know, but anyone have any 1907 Winthrop moving postcards for sale or trade?  Particularly interested in Brown, but wouldn't mind considering any others.  

DJ
x2drich2000

Super Rare!!!  I have a couple of them, but it would take a lot for me to part with one.    Here is a cool link from OldCardBoard on that series. 

[IMG]http://www.oldcardboard.com/pc/1906-winthrop/animation10.gif[/IMG]
Hi Jay, I know what you mean by super rare. I already have a McGinnity so was just looking to see if any others might be around.  I haven't seen a Mathewson or Brown show up in an auction in years.
